member.name: T:Math
member.summary: The Math class provides lots of useful mathematics related methods

member.name: M:Abs
member.summary: Gets the absolute value of the given number. For example, -32.233 will return 32.233.
member.param: The number to get the absolute value for.
member.returns: The absolute value of the given number.

member.name: M:Ceiling
member.summary: Returns the smallest integer that is greater than or equal to the argument. It rounds up the integer value. For example, 32.233 will return 33. Also, 44 will return 44.
member.param: The number whose ceiling is required.
member.returns: The ceiling value of the given number.

member.name: M:Floor
member.summary: Returns the largest integer that is less than or equal to the argument. It rounds down the integer value. For example, 32.233 will return 32. Also, 44 will return 44.
member.param: The number whose floor value is required.
member.returns: The floor value of the given number.

member.name: M:NaturalLog
member.summary: Gets the natural logarithm value of the given number.
member.param: The number whose natural logarithm value is required.
member.returns: The natural log value of the given number.

member.name: M:Log
member.summary: Gets the logarithm (base 10) value of the given number.
member.param: The number whose logarithm value is required
member.returns: The log value of the given number

member.name: M:Cos
member.summary: Gets the cosine of the given angle in radians.
member.param: The angle whose cosine is needed (in radians).
member.returns: The cosine of the given angle.

member.name: M:Sin
member.summary: Gets the sine of the given angle in radians.
member.param: The angle whose sine is needed (in radians)
member.returns: The sine of the given angle

member.name: M:Tan
member.summary: Gets the tangent of the given angle in radians.
member.param: The angle whose tangent is needed (in radians).
member.returns: The tangent of the given angle.

member.name: M:ArcSin
member.summary: Gets the angle in radians, given the sin value.
member.param: The sine value whose angle is needed.
member.returns: The angle (in radians) for the given sine Value.

member.name: M:ArcCos
member.summary: Gets the angle in radians, given the cosine value.
member.param: The cosine value whose angle is needed.
member.returns: The angle (in radians) for the given cosine Value.

member.name: M:ArcTan
member.summary: Gets the angle in radians, given the tangent value.
member.param: The tangent value whose angle is needed.
member.returns: The angle (in radians) for the given tangent Value.

member.name: M:GetDegrees
member.summary: Converts a given angle in radians to degrees.
member.param: The angle in radians.
member.returns: The converted angle in degrees.

member.name: M:GetRadians
member.summary: Converts a given angle in degrees to radians.
member.param: The angle in degrees.
member.returns: The converted angle in radians.

member.name: M:SquareRoot
member.summary: Gets the square root of a given number.
member.param: The number whose square root value is needed.
member.returns: The square root value of the given number.

member.name: M:Power
member.summary: Raises the base number to the specified power.
member.param: The number to be raised to the exponent power.
The power to raise the base number.
member.returns: The base number raised to the specified exponent.

member.name: M:Round
member.summary: Rounds a given number to the nearest integer. For example 32.233 will be rounded to 32.0 while 32.566 will be rounded to 33.
member.param: The number whose approximation is required.
member.returns: The rounded value of the given number.

member.name: M:Max
member.summary: Compares two numbers and returns the greater of the two.
member.param: The first of the two numbers to compare.
The second of the two numbers to compare.
member.returns: The greater value of the two numbers.

member.name: M:Min
member.summary: Compares two numbers and returns the smaller of the two.
member.param: The first of the two numbers to compare.
The second of the two numbers to compare.
member.returns: The smaller value of the two numbers.

member.name: M:Remainder
member.summary: Divides the first number by the second and returns the remainder.
member.param: The number to divide.
The number that divides.
member.returns: The remainder after the division.

member.name: M:GetRandomNumber
member.summary: Gets a random number between 1 and the specified maxNumber (inclusive).
member.param: The maximum number for the requested random value.
member.returns: A Random number that is less than or equal to the specified max.

member.name: M:DoubleToDecimal
member.summary: Handles double to decimal conversion
member.param: The input number
member.returns: The output number

member.name: P:Pi
